sys_openapi_operation.name: Get edit issue metadata

openapi.display_value: The Jira Cloud platform REST API - 1001.0.0-SNAPSHOT

sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Get edit issue metadata","fOperationId":"getEditIssueMeta","fDescription":"Returns the edit screen fields for an issue that are visible to and editable by the user. Use the information to populate the requests in [Edit issue](#api-rest-api-2-issue-issueIdOrKey-put).

Connect app users with admin permissions (from user permissions and app scopes) can return additional details using:

 * `overrideScreenSecurity` Returns hidden fields.
 * `overrideEditableFlag` Returns uneditable fields. For example, where an issue has a workflow status of closed none of its fields are editable.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 * *Browse projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the project that the issue is in.
 * If [issue-level security](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/J4lKLg) is configured, issue-level security permission to view the issue.

Note: For any fields to be editable the user must have the *Edit issues* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the issue.","fPath":"/rest/api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/editmeta","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returned if the request is successful.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson2595020091","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/IssueUpdateMetadata","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the authentication credentials are incorrect or missing.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user uses an override parameter but doesn't have permission to do so.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if the issue is not found or the user does not have permission to view it.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"issueIdOrKey","fDescription":"The ID or key of the issue.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"issueIdOrKey2466716278","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"overrideScreenSecurity","fDescription":"Whether hidden fields should be returned. Available to connect app users with admin permissions.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"overrideScreenSecurity6124545258","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDefault":false,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]},{"fName":"overrideEditableFlag","fDescription":"Whether non-editable fields should be returned. Available to connect app users with admin permissions.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"overrideEditableFlag2254553592","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDefault":false,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]}]}

edit issue metadata</name><openapi display_value="The Jira Cloud platform REST API - 1001.0.0-SNAPSHOT">a629c6231b9b28108b08419ead4bcb53</openapi><path>/rest/api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/editmeta</path><serialized_operation>{"fName":"Get edit issue metadata","fOperationId":"getEditIssueMeta","fDescription":"Returns the edit screen fields for an issue that are visible to and editable by the user. Use the information to populate the requests in [Edit issue](#api-rest-api-2-issue-issueIdOrKey-put).

Connect app users with admin permissions (from user permissions and app scopes) can return additional details using:

 * `overrideScreenSecurity` Returns hidden fields.
 * `overrideEditableFlag` Returns uneditable fields. For example, where an issue has a workflow status of closed none of its fields are editable.

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 * *Browse projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the project that the issue is in.
 * If [issue-level security](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/J4lKLg) is configured, issue-level security permission to view the issue.

Note: For any fields to be editable the user must have the *Edit issues* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) for the issue.","fPath":"/rest/api/2/issue/{issueIdOrKey}/editmeta","fHttpMethod":"GET","fDeprecated":false,"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"Returned if the request is successful.","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson2595020091","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/IssueUpdateMetadata","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"401","fDescription":"Returned if the authentication credentials are incorrect or missing.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"Returned if the user uses an override parameter but doesn't have permission to do so.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Returned if the issue is not found or the user does not have permission to view it.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"issueIdOrKey","fDescription":"The ID or key of the issue.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"issueIdOrKey2466716278","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"overrideScreenSecurity","fDescription":"Whether hidden fields should be returned. Available to connect app users with admin permissions.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"overrideScreenSecurity6124545258","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDefault":false,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]},{"fName":"overrideEditableFlag","fDescription":"Whether non-editable fields should be returned. Available to connect app users with admin permissions.","fRequired":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"query","fExplode":true,"fStyle":"form","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"overrideEditableFlag2254553592","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"boolean","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fDefault":false,"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"boolean"}}]}]}</serialized_operation><sys_class_name>sys_openapi_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chris.crockett</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-09 23:43:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>cb4946a71b9b28108b08419ead4bcb9c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get edit issue metadata</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3f">984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">984874091bdfa8508b08419ead4bcb3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_openapi_operation_cb4946a71b9b28108b08419ead4bcb9c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chris.crockett</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-09 23:43:25</sys_updated_on></sys_openapi_operation></record_update>
